alert.note: Alert for Inland Calhoun; Inland Kleberg; Inland Nueces; Inland Refugio; Inland San Patricio; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued January 19 at 2:24AM CST until January 20 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 possible. * WHERE...Victoria, Inland Kleberg, Inland Nueces, Inland San Patricio, Inland Refugio and Inland Calhoun Counties. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 6 AM CST Friday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Friday night through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Inland Calhoun; Inland Kleberg; Inland Nueces; Inland Refugio; Inland San Patricio; Victoria
